name: High School: bisexual experience
description:
This story also relates to the typical life of an openly bisexual girl in highschool who suffers many hardships everyday, just trying to maintain her self-image at a stable point and living life the best way she can- even with the reputation as "dyke".

Please honor the openly bisexual or homosexual people, no matter the gender, the race, or the type, because it's not an easy life for them. Please respect the ones who are brave enough to go through this discrimination day by day, only because they were tired of hiding who they are.Features
  • А story full of emotions;
  • Relaxing music;
  • Story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Many characters in one story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
